Class Bgm

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.media.Bgm
public class Bgm extends Object
This class handles the background music for the game.

This class loads the volume from SaveDataType, ensures the background music is played on an infinite loop.

This class is responsible for:

  • Initializing the background music file
  • Applying the volume settings
  • Playing the music on loop
  • Starting or changing the music volume

  • Constructor Details

    • Bgm

      public Bgm()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init()
      Initializes the background music player, loads the default audio file, set the audio on loop and sets the volume.

    • play

      public static void play()
      Starts playing the background music. If the player has not been initialized, this method does nothing.

    • setVolume

      public static void setVolume()
      Sets the volume of the background music based on the user's saved preference.

      The volume is read from SaveData using the line indicated by SaveDataType. The saved value is stored as an integer and converted to a decimal between 0 and 1, as required by MediaPlayer.

      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if reading the saved volume from SaveDataType.
